title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: O.M.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black and green ink, brush and black ink, green watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: O. M.; at upper right corner: 976
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Circular monogram comprised of an "O" drawn in thick black outline with a small black circle in center over which a narrow "M" is superimposed in green.
